content.rendered:
• home

Eyelash Extensions Cape Town: No More Mascara!

You’re tired of wearing mascara every day to make your eyelashes look full and long. It’s a hassle, it takes time, and you can never seem to get the right amount on each lash.

Imagine waking up in the morning with beautiful lashes that are already curled and ready for you. Your eyes will be brighter and more awake-looking, and people will notice how pretty they look!

Eyelash extensions are applied one lash at a time by trained professionals who use special tools to apply individual synthetic hairs directly onto your natural lashes. The result is an instant transformation without any mess or fuss – just gorgeous-looking eyes!

Book Your procedure

What are eyelash extensions and how does it work?

Individual synthetic hairs are applied one at a time to your natural eyelashes by trained professionals using special tools. The result is an instant transformation that gives you gorgeous-looking eyes!


Eyelash extensions are applied one lash at a time by trained professionals who use special tools that allow them to apply individual synthetic hairs directly onto your natural lashes. The result is an instant transformation without any mess or fuss – just gorgeous-looking eyes!


Lash extensions come in a variety of lengths, thicknesses, and colours so you can customise the look to suit your style. You can also choose to have them applied only to the upper lashes, lower lashes, or both!

Book Your procedure

The benefits of eyelash extensions

  • They're convenient
  • They look natural
  • They're long-lasting
  • They're low-maintenance
  • They boost your confidence
  • Smudge-Proof
  • Emphasise Eyes
  • Natural to Striking Designs (Custom made for each client's needs)
Book Your procedure

How Does the Eyelash Extensions Procedure Work at Blink Beauty Salons?

Before Treatment

As you come in for your appointment, our team will assess your lashes to get an understanding of the condition they’re in and what type of extensions would be best suited for you.

We will also discuss the different lash extension options we offer and the length, thickness, and colour of the lashes you would like to achieve.

During Treatment

Once you have decided on the perfect lash look, our team will apply the extensions one by one to your natural lashes. A complete set of lashes takes approximately 90 minutes to apply. You can maintain them year-round with recommended touch-ups every two to three weeks. 

They can be used as filler to make your natural lashes thicker or applied outward from the eye for something different.

After Treatment

When your lash extension treatment is complete, you’ll be able to enjoy the benefits of beautiful lashes that are ready to go – no need for mascara!

Your lash extensions will last anywhere from two to three weeks, at which point you’ll need a fill to maintain the look. Fills are recommended every two to three weeks to keep your lashes looking their best.

If you want to take a break from lash extensions, simply let your natural lashes grow out, and they will eventually fall off on their own

Book Your procedure

Why Choose Blink Beauty Salons for Your Eyelash Extensions Treatment?

Waiting for your mascara to dry is a thing of the past with eyelash extensions from Blink Beauty Salons! We are proud to offer our clients the highest quality, individual lash extensions applied by our team of trained professionals.

We use only the best products and materials to ensure that your lash extensions are long-lasting and look natural. We also offer a variety of lash extension options so you can customise the look to suit your style.

Whether you’re looking for a convenient, low-maintenance way to enhance your natural beauty or you, want to boost your confidence with a dramatic new look, Blink Beauty Salons is the place to go for all your lash extension needs!

Let your lashes do the talking. Book your appointment today!

Testimonials

 5/5

Candy and Melanie are amazing. Both my powder brow and eyelash extension procedures went seamlessly and both times I was made to feel very comfortable. They made sure I left their studio feeling confident and beautiful
Pearl Sathekge
 5/5

Candy and her team were so friendly, professional and welcoming. I did my Powder Brows & Winged Eyeliner without any real pain, quick and efficient!!! Love my results 💜. Thank you team Blink, see you soon.
Je'zelle Visser
 5/5

“Amazing experience“

Had the most awesome experience at Blink Aesthetic Clinic today. From the time of making the appointment until having my top and bottom permanent eyeliner today, I have not come across such wonderful human beings and so professional. I was so nervous but Candy and Bronwyn were so calm it rubbed off on me. It was such a breeze and sorry I never had it done before. The Clinic is amazing and cannot wait to visit again. Thank you Candy and Bronwyn, amazing experience, totally recommended
Gillian Joffe-Stitson
 5/5

“So impressed with the results“

I am so happy with the excellent service i received at Blink aesthetic clinic. A few years back I had semi permanent eyeliner done at another establishment and unfortunately it was not as desired. Candy reasured me that she could remove my stuborn eyeliner and after 2 sessions i am so impressed with the results. Candy is so skilled and so sweet. I highly recommend Blink aesthetic clinic. I am looking forward to my next visit.
Lindy Faye Uffhaus
 5/5

“An amazing job on my eyebrows!“

I had the honor of stepping into this beautiful space and loved every minute of it! Candy- explained a few things to me no-one did and made me understand why my treatment was one of the best decisions ever! Bianca- was an absolute gem and did an amazing job on my eyebrows! All the scabs have fallen off, and I’m more inlove than ever Thank you so much ladies I can’t wait for many more treatments
Chantay Dudgeon
 5/5

“Candi is absolutely amazing“

Amazing friendly service . Great results . Candi is absolutely amazing . She is experienced and caring. She has a passion for her art and it shows in her work . My eyelashes and lips look amazing and I feel absolutely fantastic.
Anoshini Chetty
Book Your procedure

Eyelash extensions before and after

Book Your procedure

What do eyelash extensions cost?

  • Classic New Set (90 minutes) R770
  • Classic fill (45 minutes) R300
  • Volume New Set (90 minutes) R850
  • Volume fill (45 minutes) R350
  • Mega 5D New Set (90 minutes) R950
  • Mega fill (45 minutes) R400
  • Brow tint (15 minutes) R100
  • Lash tint (15 minutes) R100
  • Lash lift & tint (60 minutes) R450
  • Brow lamination & tint (60 minutes) R500
  • Brow wax & tint (15 minutes) R250
Book Your procedure

Frequently asked questions about eyelash extensions

How long does it take to apply eyelash extensions?

The process of having lash extensions applied takes around 1-2 hours, depending on the number of lashes being applied and the style you choose.

How often do I need to get them done?

Lash extensions typically last for 2-4 weeks before they start to naturally fall out, although you may need to get them refilled sooner if you have particularly active eyelash growth.  We recommend a lash fill every 2 weeks for best results.

How do I care for my lash extensions?

To keep your lash extensions looking their best, avoid using oil-based products around the eyes and be gentle when cleaning them. You should also avoid rubbing or pulling on your lashes, as this can cause them to fall out prematurely.

Will my lash extensions damage my natural lashes?

No, when applied correctly by Lash extensions are low-maintenance and easy to care for! Just avoid rubbing or pulling on your lashes, and be careful when using oil-based products around your eyes.

Do lash extensions hurt?

No, the process of having lash extensions applied is painless! You may feel a slight pressure on your lashes as the extension adhesive is being applied, but it should not be uncomfortable.

How long do lash extensions last?

Lash extensions typically last for 2-4 weeks before they start to naturally fall out, although you may need to get them refilled sooner if you have particularly active eyelash growth.  We recommend a lash fill every 2 weeks for best results.

What are the different types of lash extensions?

There are many different types of lash extensions available, from natural-looking styles to more dramatic looks. You can choose the style that best suits your needs and preferences.  The most popular is Classic, Volume & Mega lashes.

How much do lash extensions cost?

The cost of lash extensions varies depending on the type of extensions you choose and the number of lashes being applied. However, you can expect to pay anywhere from R700 and R1 000 for a full set of lash extensions.

Are lash extensions safe?

Yes, lash extensions are safe when applied correctly by a trained professional. However, there are some risks associated with lash extensions, such as infection or allergic reactions. Be sure to consult with a trained professional before having lash extensions applied.

I have sensitive eyes. Can I still get lash extensions?

Yes, you can still get lash extensions even if you have sensitive eyes. Just be sure to let your lash technician know about your sensitivity so they can take extra care when applying the extensions.

What is the maintenance of eyelash extensions?

Maintaining your lash extensions is essential to keeping them looking their best. You can extend their lifespan by brushing them each day, cleaning them every few days, and avoiding anything that could damage or loosen your natural lashes. Taking these extra measures will save you both time and money in the long run.

What can ruin your eyelash extensions?

Lashes that are too long or thick can cause damage in the long run; they weigh more than shorter lashes and put pressure on your hair follicles. That strain can cause your natural lashes to fall out sooner, resulting in permanent harm.  At Blink, we take extra care during our consultation process to advise best results for our clients.

What happens when you stop getting eyelash extensions?

If your lashes fall out on their own, they will grow back in time and, with the aid of lash serums, even faster. On the other hand, lash extensions throw off the entire process by interrupting the natural lash cycle; when you remove them, you're likely to experience a period where your lashes are thinner and sparser than usual. In order to avoid this, it's important to take a break from lash extensions every few months. This will give your lashes time to recover and grow back to their natural state.

Is it better to get eyelash extension removed or let them fall out?

The best way to remove your lash extensions is by waiting for them to fall out on their own. This will protect your natural lashes from being pulled out as well. If you absolutely must remove them sooner, be sure to consult with a professional to avoid damaging your lashes.
At Blink we do offer soak-off services to remove an old set or lashes you no longer want to wear anymore.
